titleStmt.title: Holy discoveries and flames. By John Saltmarshe, Mr. of Arts of Magdalen Colledge in Cambridge, and rector of West-Ileslerton in York-shire
titleStmt.author: Saltmarsh, John, d. 1647.
W. F., fl. 1640, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R[obert] Y[oung] for P. Nevill in Ivie-lane,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved, signed: WF: sculp:.

Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
